-%0Afrom abc import ABC, abstractmethod%0A%0Aimport math%0Aclass Shape():%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def get_area(self):%0A        pass%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def get_perimeter(self):%0A        pass%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def get_name(self):%0A        pass%0A%0Aclass Point2D:%0A    def __init__(self, x:float, y:float):%0A        self.x = x%0A        self.y = y%0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22%7Bself.x%7D,%7Bself.y%7D%22%0A%0Aclass Circle(Shape):%0A    def __init__(self, center:Point2D,radius:float):%0A        self.center = center%0A        self.radius = radius%0A        self.name = %22Circ%22%0A%0A    def get_name(self):%0A        return self.name%0A    def get_area(self):%0A        return math.pi * (self.radius ** 2)%0A    def get_perimeter(self):%0A        return 2 * math.pi * self.radius%0A    %0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22%7Bself.get_name()%7D: C=(%7Bself.center%7D), R= %7Bself.radius%7D%22%0A    %0A%0Aclass Rectangle(Shape):%0A    def __init__(self, p1:Point2D, p2:Point2D):%0A        self.p1 = p1%0A        self.p2 = p2%0A        self.name = %22Rect%22%0A    %0A%0A    def get_name(self):%0A        return self.name%0A    %0A    def get_area(self):%0A        width = abs(self.p2.x - self.p1.x)%0A        height = abs(self.p2.y - self.p1.y)%0A        return width * height%0A    %0A    def get_perimeter(self):%0A        width = abs(self.p2.x - self.p1.x)%0A        height = abs(self.p2.y - self.p1.y)%0A        return 2 * (width + height)%0A    %0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22%7Bself.get_name()%7D: P1=(%7Bself.p1%7D), P2=(%7Bself.p2%7D)%22%0A        %0A%0Adef main():%0A    shapes = %5B%5D%0A    while True:%0A        try:%0A            line = input()%0A            args = line.split()%0A            cmd = args%5B0%5D%0A            print(%22$%22 + line)%0A            if cmd == %22circle%22:%0A                x = float(args%5B1%5D)%0A                y = float(args%5B2%5D)%0A                r = float(args%5B3%5D)%0A                circle = Circle(Point2D(x,y),r)%0A                shapes.append(circle)%0A            elif cmd == %22rect%22:%0A                x1 = float(args%5B1%5D)%0A                y1 = float(args%5B2%5D)%0A                x2 = float(args%5B3%5D)%0A                y2 = float(args%5B4%5D)%0A                rectangle = Rectangle(Point2D(x1,y1),Point2D(x2,y2))%0A                shapes.append(rectangle)%0A            elif cmd == %22info%22:%0A                for shape in shapes:%0A                    print(f%22%7Bshape.get_name()%7D: Area=%7Bshape.get_area():.2f%7D Perimeter=%7Bshape.get_perimeter():.2f%7D%22)%0A            elif cmd == %22show%22:%0A                for shape in shapes:%0A                    print(str(shape))%0A            elif cmd == %22end%22:%0A                break%0A            else:%0A                print(%22fail: command invalid%22)%0A%0A        except Exception as e:%0A            print(%22fail:%22, e)%0A        %0A%0Amain()
